question: How can we improve customer satisfaction in our online shopping platform?
true_answer: Implement personalized recommendations, enhance user interface, and improve customer support response times.

steps.description: Identify current customer satisfaction pain points

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Key pain points: slow website load times, lack of personalized recommendations; best practices: AI-driven suggestions, seamless UX.

steps.content: How can we improve customer satisfaction in our online shopping platform?
Creating plan to enhance customer satisfaction: 1) Identify pain points. 2) Research industry best practices. 3) Analyze platform feedback. 4) Propose improvements.
Decomposing into research, data analysis, and proposal drafting.
Assigning pain point identification to researcher.
Researching customer feedback on platform usability and satisfaction.
Identified slow load times and lack of personalized experiences as main issues.
Marking pain point identification complete.
Assigning best practice research to browser_use_agent.
Exploring e-commerce strategies for customer satisfaction improvement.
Found effective practices: AI-driven recommendations, streamlined navigation.
Updating shared knowledge with best practices.
Assigning feedback analysis to analyzer.
Analyzing customer survey data and support tickets.
Analysis indicates need for faster support responses and UI improvements.
Feedback: Consider adding live chat support and improving mobile responsiveness.
Incorporating feedback and refining improvement proposals.
Assigning proposal drafting to principal_agent.
Drafting proposal for enhancements: personalized AI-driven recommendations, UI overhaul, improved responsiveness.
Implement personalized recommendations, enhance user interface, and improve customer support response times.
Recording final proposals for ongoing improvement strategy.
